name: Monster Truck:Demolition Derby
description:
Best 3D Monster Truck demolition derby of 2017. Xtreme 4x4 big truck derby game.

Lets have some demolition derby experience of 4X4 Monster Trucks. Dive into the deadly arena of big monster trucks to finish them all. Demolish or be demolished.

Monstrous, angry & ferocious - that’s the kind of trucker you are! So go out there and steamroll your opponents. It is a wild wild world out there and you need to go all out for survival. Survival of the fittest - that’s what they say and that’s what you are going to do in this crazy monster truck destruction battle game. Be relentless in your attacks and be watchful of your opponents who are all gearing up to ram you into eternity.

Monster Truck Demolition derby is 2017's best big monster truck games. It offers ultimate battle and demolition derby of 4x4 big trucks.

We know you will emerge as the winner of the truck wars. Let the battle begin!
